thread.title: Great Hotel for the Price!
thread.title_full: Great Hotel for the Price! - Review of Room Mate Grace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: stone13060
title: Great Hotel for the Price!
text: Stayed for my birthday weekend in January with my daughter. We loved the pool even thought the water was a bit cold but loved the pool bar! Bartender was very nice. The room was nice and the staff was outstanding!!! When I got to our room I found a birthday cupcake for me!!
